instance.situation: I have struggled with depression for a while but recently it seems to be getting worse, with no clear reason.

dialog.text: Good afternoon how may I help you today?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Hello there. I'm suffering with increased depression and I'm not quite clear why.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] sad [xIntent] none [xWant] to get better [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: I'm sorry to hear that. Is there any change in your routine as of lately?
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] Just to feel better [str] christmas, holidays, merry, holiday, season [aff] Sad

dialog.text: No not really. I have suffered from depression before but it seems to have spiked recently. The only thing that is different these days is lockdown. I think that's the same for everyone.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] happy [xIntent] none [xWant] to be safe [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: These past few months has been extremely difficult. In the past, what did you do for your depression?
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] Stay safe [str] purpose, change, gets, future, offer [aff] Sad

dialog.text: I saw a psychiatrist face to face but only once every month. I've always had a low mood but now I'm anxious that it will continue to get worse.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] worried [xIntent] none [xWant] to get better [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: Talking to a professional is always ideal. Is there a way to see that psychiatrist again?
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] Just to feel better [str] christmas, holidays, merry, holiday, season [aff] Sad

dialog.text: Since lockdown haven't spoken to her but maybe she can do a video call. At the start it was fine, I was feeling just as I always have but I don't want this to get any worse. What if she isn't available?
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] worried [xIntent] none [xWant] to get better [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: It wouldn't hurt to try and reach out. If she isn't available, there are other services.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] to care for yourself. [str] 13f, 27f, subs, purely, abandoned [aff] Anxious

dialog.text: What like support groups etc? I'm also sure this isn't just related to lockdown and not seeing my specialist. It's weird and a little concerning to be honest.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] worried [xIntent] none [xWant] honest [xNeed] none [xEffect] but i do n't like it

dialog.text: Not necessarily support groups, but more like psychiatry apps where a trained professional is available via chat, or video and its specifically through the app.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] If you don't care about it, whatever. [str] driveway, son, 3am, car, looked [aff] Afraid

dialog.text: I hadn't thought of that. I know there are a few of these nowadays.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] none [xIntent] none [xWant] to ask for help [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: There a lot more since Covid began in March, so it's worth as a backup plan if your doctor isn't available. Sometimes its good to have options.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] Talking to someone helps. [str] motivation, enjoyment, laziness, reposting, tough [aff] Hopeful

dialog.text: I'll start a plan and seeing if I can see my usual therapist and go from there. Sometimes it just helps talk it through depression stops you from seeing things clearly. Do you have any experience with mental health issues?
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] worried [xIntent] none [xWant] to be a doctor [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: After my son was born I developed Post Partem depression and anxiety. It wasn't until almost a year and half after he was born to realize it.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] And if you don't want to take meds, a psychiatrist (if they're a good one.) [str] materialistically, repost, personally, average, loving [aff] Apprehensive

dialog.text: That must have been difficult to deal with. Mental health affects so many people in so many ways. It's good that it's recognised these days at least.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] happy [xIntent] none [xWant] to be recognized [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: It was. Luckily I had my doctor to help me. Family members meant well but chalked it up to "that's what its like to be a mom" but it is more than that.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] To make someone happy. [str] fight, injustice, doesnt, mend, stubborn [aff] Hopeful

dialog.text: I think this is why it's always best to see a professional. I really should try to reconnect with mine.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] happy [xIntent] to be successful [xWant] friends [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: I agree. There is a lot of well meaning advice out there, but its best to see a professional to really help you.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] friends? [str] career, yes, clue, start, admission [aff] Hopeful

dialog.text: Thanks for the chat, it has helped me put things in perspective.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] happy [xIntent] to be helpful [xWant] to make me understand [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: I'm glad I could help. I hope you get to speak with your psychiatrist, or at least find a good one through an app.

dialog.heal: [resp] To identify issues, and help find productive ways to improve yourself. [str] group, therapy, experiences, blah, helpful [aff] Hopeful

dialog.text: Thank you!

instance.situation: Me and my girlfriend got into a fight over holiday break that I thought could be fixed but instead ended up in us breaking up

dialog.text: Yes, so we had a fight previously over Thanksgiving Break about how I woke her up from her sleep and she kicked me out of her place at like 4 in the morning. Then I pick her up to go try and get breakfast...then she starts punching me while I drive so I pull over. Then she keeps hitting me until I tell her to stop.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] guilty [xIntent] to be nice [xWant] to stop [xNeed] to be driving [xEffect] none
